Description: ·        Leads a department of architects and interior designers;·        Checks that all drawings and related information received from Client / Consultant / Design Development Department are co-related according to overall project requirements, and ensures that any discrepancies identified are resolved;·        Reviews all architectural, interior design and related drawings, and ensures their adherence to applicable design and regulatory codes and standards;·        Reviews shop drawings submitted by teams and/or sub-contractors, and ensures that all designs, material and finishes specifications are followed for all related trades;·        Raises RFIs and clarifications for any discrepancies to concerned parties;·        Ensures that all drawings and information to be released for implementation are in accordance with the site’s Quality Manual and procedures, approved by the Design Principal and that all issues addressed are resolved to enable works on site to be built correctly;·        Attends technical meetings and discussions with Design Principal and Client / Consultant / Project Managers;·        Liaises with other department heads and project managers to ensure complete information;·        Liaises with site officers to ensure smooth coordination among sub-contractors and full feedback of information;·        Maintains records relating to the scope of works.Skills
Skills: ·        Extensive knowledge and experience in the preparation and production of high-quality architectural, interior design, technical drawings, sketches and three-dimensional renderings or perspectives for the proper interpretation of design concepts and their development in visual presentations or actual application on site;
·        Be familiar with all approved samples related to finishes;
·        Architectural or Interior Design degree from an accredited university with applicable professional license, membership and certifications;
·        8-10 years of work experience preferably in residential, hospitality and corporate / private offices projects;
·        Skills in 2D, technical and shop drawings, and 3D renderings;
·        Expertise in AutoCAD, 3D Max, Sketch UP and other drawing applications;
·        Knowledgeable of applicable design, construction standards, codes and regulations;
·        Has organized a project presentation and/or implementation;
·        Background in leading a team of architects / interior designers;
·        Has the ability to work with design office and site staff to achieve high-quality results;
·        Has the ability to work under difficult conditions, and is self-motivated;
